feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.36
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "exclude vendor folder from chmod" by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10632
  • v5.11.36 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10633

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.35...v5.11.36

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.37
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Significant changes around PDF generation, removing multiple codepaths.

  • Updates across all designs to improve alignment and overflow conditions.

  • v5.11.37 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10636

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.36...v5.11.37

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.38
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change default Zugferd generator
  • Design fixes
  • Updated documentation
  • Translation updates
  • Prune redundant js files
  • Adjustments for tax reports
  • Allow table breaking in calm design
  • Change email verification error code from 403 to 401
  • Update for purify html allow list.
  • Fixes for tests by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10637
  • v5.11.38 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10658

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.37...v5.11.38

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.39
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ensure primary contact is preferences in reports
  • Quickbooks imports
  • Update INR symbol
  • v5.11.39 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10659

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.38...v5.11.39
